data.text: Bilidada Suuxaka naxa a masen,
«I yi wɔyɛnyi mɔɔli falama han tɛmui mundun?
Ala nɔma nɔndi mafindide wule ra?
Xa i xa die yunubi nan nabaxi a ra,
Xa i tan Ala fenma,
xa yunubi mu na i ma, xa i tinxin,
I harige dɔnxɔɛ fama dangide na singe ra.»
«Fahaamui fen won babae ra,
Won tan mu buxi duniɲa ma,
E mu fahaamui fima xɛ i ma?
Wofiri bulama xare ma?
Hali a na a bili ma, a mu xabaxi,
Na nan fama rabade mixie ra, naxee nɛɛmuma Ala ma.
A xaxili tide bara kana, alɔ mixi naxan a kilɔnma sayɛlɛ tɛɛ ra.
A na a kilɔn na ra, a kanama nɛ, a kanyi bira.
A luma alɔ sansi, ye naxan kui rafexi,
a a sankee sɔti gɛmɛ malanxi longori ra.
Xa i na sansi tala naa, a lisima nɛ,
a mu fanma mɛnni sɔnɔn.
Ala mu tinxintɔɛ rawɔlɛma, a mu tinxintare sɛnbɛ soma.
A gbe mu luxi a xa i rasɛɛwa,
I xɔnmixie fama lude yaagi kui, e xɔnyie fa bira.»
